Hit Points: 21 Armor Class: 16 (dexterity; trained) Class DC: Fighter: 16 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Goblin Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Dogslicer; Horsechopper; Goblin Weapons)
Goblin Weapon Familiarity: Attack Trained (Dogslicer; Horsechopper)
Unbreakable Goblin: +4 Hit Points
Attack Of Opportunity: May use a Reaction to Strike a foe that uses a manipulate action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square while moving
Burn It!: +1 HP persistent fire damage/+1/4 item level fire damage from alchemical items
Goblin Scuttle: May use a Reaction to take a Step when an ally moves to an adjacent position
Goblin Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon goblin weapons/Treats goblin weapons as one category simpler
Goblin Weapon Frenzy: Critical hits with a goblin weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Point-Blank Shot: Stance negates volley penalty from a ranged volley weapon and gives +2 attack at close range with a ranged non-volley weapon
Razortooth Goblin: Jaw attack inflicts 1d6P HP
Shield Block: Shield negates damage up to its hardness and absorbs half of remaining damage
Skittering Scuttle: May use Goblin Scuttle to Stride 12'
Very,Very Sneaky: May Sneak at full speed and without cover
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +8 (dexterity; expert); Will: +3 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Charhide Goblin: Has fire resistance 1/DC 10 to recover from fire damage; DC 5 with help
Irongut Goblin: +2 vs. afflictions and sickened from ingestion; successes on saves are critical successes
Snow Goblin: Has cold resistance 1/Treats environmental cold as 1 step less extreme
Unbreakable Goblin: Suffers half distance falling damage
Magic
Magic Notes: Burn It!: Fire spells inflict additional damage equal to half the spell level
